ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Pure gaming computer
ygData.msgSnippet: Alienware - www.alienware.com Falcon NW - www.falcon-nw.com Voodoo PC - www.voodoopc.com The top 3 gaming machine vendors, in the order I personally rate them.
ygData.messageBody:
Alienware - www.alienware.com
Falcon NW - www.falcon-nw.com
Voodoo PC - www.voodoopc.com

The top 3 gaming machine vendors, in the order I personally rate them.


-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaard, Jeff [mailto:jeff.nygaard@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 26, 2001 11:31 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Pure gaming computer


Anyone have a web address of a good company that sells computers built for
the purpose of playing online games only? I would like to get a new computer
one day and would like to find one of these sites to browse.

Thanks in advance for your help!

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
